Are you sure
you want to quit?

Fox + Mouse

The fox has a seasonal diet. In the summer
grasshoppers, beetles, berries and nuts. But
come winter the mice need to watch out!
They go to the top of the menu.

Frog + Lily Pad

The frog is cold blooded so sit in the sun
on the lily pad to raise his core temperature.

Robin + Worm

Earthworms are a part of a
robin's diet along with blueberries,
caterpillars and poison ivy!

Rhino + Oxpecker

The bird has short legs and claws to perch
on the Rhino's back and eat parasites. It will
also alert the animal if predators approach.

Dove + Cactus

The dove pollinates as it sips the cactus
nectar and later eats and spreads the seeds.
These two depend on each other.

Cow + Grass

The cow eats the grass and to digest it they
have a huge stomach with 4 pouches. The
largest of the 4 is the size of a 55 gallon can!

Hummingbird + Honeysuckle

The hummingbird hovers next to the flower
to eat the nectar which is so sweet
it's like liquid candy!
